about_description: The ultimate tool for film and production crew management.
our_mission_content: At Light Crew, our mission is to streamline the complexities of film production management. We believe that by providing a powerful, intuitive, and accessible platform, we can empower creators, managers, and crew members to focus on what they do best: creating amazing visual stories. We aim to eliminate administrative bottlenecks, improve communication, and bring transparency to every stage of the production lifecycle.
our_vision_content: We envision a future where production management is no longer a source of stress but a seamless part of the creative process. Light Crew will be the industry-standard tool, known for its reliability, offline-first capabilities, and user-centric design. We are committed to continuous innovation, ensuring our platform evolves with the dynamic needs of the film and media industry.

feature_crew_desc: Maintain detailed crew profiles and track attendance with our intuitive calendar system.
feature_offline_desc: Work confidently on set, even without an internet connection. Your data syncs automatically.

manual_description: A complete guide to using the Light Crew application.
manual_getting_started_desc: Welcome to Light Crew! This guide will walk you through the essential features and workflows to get the most out of the application.
manual_dashboard_desc: The Dashboard is the first page you see after logging in. It provides a personalized, at-a-glance overview of your financial activity. You can filter your earnings, shifts, and payment status by month, year, or specific projects. This is where you can track your total earnings, paid amounts, and outstanding balance for any given period.
manual_masters_desc_p1: Before you can effectively manage projects, you need to set up your master lists. Navigate to the Masters page from the sidebar. Here you can:
manual_masters_dop_gaffer_desc: Create profiles for your main Directors of Photography and Gaffers.
manual_masters_designations_desc: Add all possible crew roles (e.g., Spark, Grip, Asst. Cameraman) to this list. This list will be used when adding new crew roles.
manual_masters_desc_p2: Keeping these lists updated is key to a smooth workflow.
manual_projects_desc: Go to the Projects page. Click 'Add Project' to create a new entry. Fill in details like the client name, dates, and locations. The most important step here is assigning your crew. You can select multiple crew members and define their specific designation and daily wage for this project.
manual_team_desc: The Team page is where you manage individual crew roles. It's important to understand that each entry here represents a person in a specific role. A single person can have multiple entries if they work in different roles (e.g., John Doe as Gaffer, John Doe as Grip). When you click 'Add Crew Role', you create a unique profile for a person in that role. You can optionally assign this new role directly to a project. The `MID` (Member ID) is automatically generated to uniquely identify the person, even across different roles.
manual_attendance_desc: The Attendance page is where you log daily shifts. The workflow is:
manual_attendance_step1: Select a Project from the first dropdown.
manual_attendance_step2: The DOP and Gaffer dropdowns will auto-fill based on the project settings, but you can change them.
manual_attendance_step3: Select a Crew Member Role from the second dropdown. This lists all roles assigned to the selected project.
manual_attendance_step4: Their attendance calendar will appear. Click 'Add Shift' to log a new entry for a specific date, filling in times, shift duration, and any notes.
manual_attendance_step5: Existing shifts can be viewed or edited by clicking on a marked date in the calendar.
manual_payments_desc: On the Payments page, you can manage the financials for each project. Select a project to see a list of all crew members who have worked on it, along with their total earnings, paid amount, and outstanding balance. Use the action menu on each crew member's card to 'Update Payment' and log any new payments made to them.
manual_reports_desc_p1: The Reports page provides powerful exporting capabilities.
manual_reports_project_desc: Select a project to get a complete financial breakdown of every crew member who worked on it.
manual_reports_crew_desc: Select a crew member to see a summary of their work across all projects, broken down by each role they performed.
manual_reports_attendance_desc: Get a monthly calendar-style breakdown of every shift for a specific project.
manual_reports_desc_p2: All reports can be exported to PDF, Excel, or Word for sharing and record-keeping.
manual_app_lock_desc_p1: You can add an extra layer of security to your app with a password lock.
manual_app_lock_enable_desc: Go to Settings > Security and toggle the 'App Lock' switch to the 'on' position.
manual_app_lock_use_desc: After enabling, the next time you open the app, you will be required to enter your main account login password to access your data.
manual_app_lock_forgot_desc: If you forget your password, simply click the 'Forgot Password?' link on the lock screen to go through the standard password reset process.
privacy_intro: Light Crew ('we,' 'our,' or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

privacy_collection_personal_desc: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, mobile number, and email address, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Application.
privacy_collection_financial_desc: Data related to your payments and transactions, such as daily wages, payments made, and project financials, that you input into the application. This data is stored securely and is used solely for the functionality of the app.
privacy_collection_firebase_desc: We use Firebase for authentication and as our database. As such, Firebase may collect information as described in their own privacy policy. We specifically use Firebase Authentication for login and Firestore for data storage.
privacy_use_intro: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Application to:
privacy_use_item2: Process your transactions and manage financial data for projects.
privacy_use_item3: Enable user-to-user communications within project contexts.
privacy_use_item4: Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the Application.
privacy_use_item5: Notify you of updates to the Application.
privacy_use_item6: Comply with legal obligations as required by Indian and U.S. law.

privacy_disclosure_law_title: By Law or to Protect Rights:

privacy_disclosure_providers_desc: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including data analysis, hosting services (Firebase), and customer service.

These companies may use information about your visits to the Application and other websites that are contained in web cookies to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you. We will update this policy and provide necessary controls if and when this feature is implemented.
